subject: Re: Tal.king to you
body:
Hi there lovely,
I was searching the net few days ago. I am new to this thing.
and saw your profileb. I decided to email you cause I found 
you attractive. I might come down to yoaur city in few weeks.
Let me know if we can meet each other in person.
I am attractive girl. I am sure you won't regret it.
Reply to my personal email at lyf@JumpPost.info
